data.title: Opening Times & Prices
data.meta_description: Find opening times and prices for the Runway Visitor Park
data.text:
Car Parking Charges

The Runway Visitor Park only accepts payment by debit/credit card (except American Express) we also accept apple and android pay

NoÂ cashÂ payment accepted

Car and Motorbike parking charges are as follows

Â£5 up to 2 hour

Â£10 from 2 hours up to 4 hours

Â£12 for all stays over 4 hours

Coach Parking is charged at a flat rate of Â£12

Parking is free for all conference delegates

There is free admission to the Runway Visitor Park for visitors arriving by public transport, on foot or by bicycle (not motorbike)

Lost Property

Any items found on site will be kept for 14 days and then either donated or disposed

If you have lost an item please contact reception on 0161 489 3932

Dogs

Guide and assistance dogs are welcome at the Park (Other dogs are not permitted)
